titleStmt.title: A health to the gentlemanly profession of seruingmen; or, The seruingmans comforts With other thinges not impertinent to the premisses, as well pleasant as profitable to the courteous reader.
titleStmt.author: Markham, Gervase, 1568?-1637, attributed name.
I. M., fl. 1598.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
